name: Shooting Mama
description:
A mixture of a cooking simulator  and a shooting game  The objective of the game is to complete the orders. 

WASD - Move

Mouse Click - Pick up / Place / Shoot

Q - Draw Weapon.

E - Craft the burger on the table

The objective is to deliver as many hamburgers as you can, aproaching to the ingredients we need, click on them and placing them on the table. Then you have to press E to craft our burger and deliver it to our customer. But, be careful!!! Some ingredients will start running away, because they are aware of their terrible fate. If an ingredient starts running, you can’t take more from the table. You will have to HUNT it. Press Q and start shooting, get it, and place it on the table aswell. But don’t get crazy and kill them all, because you will waste food!
